issue.title: [Rust] Add debug implementation for Buffer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5298](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5298). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Default debug implementation is not good enough for debugging.
